description: Wouldn't we all love a Tom's BBQ in our neighborhood or jobsite?  Well Tom's "Pig Rig" is just what you are looking for. We've designed a mobile unit to bring out the BEST of what Tom's BBQ has to offer.  Check us out for Menu, and Present Times & Locations! Keep your eyes while on the Phoenix roads and one day you may be lucky enough to be riding next to our huge Pink Pig Rig.
name: Tom's BBQ Pig Rig
